title: Mismatch, Marriage, and a Marathon
teaser:
An unlikely romance between an outdoorsy guy and an indoorsy woman; trials and tribulations of a marriage plus eight children; and Peter Sagal distracts himself from the pain of his divorce by running a marathon.  Hosted by Senior Producer, Jenifer Hixson.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole, Massachusetts.
contentencoded:
Jessica Lee Williamson follows love to a campsite and loses her sense of self.
 
Horace HB Sanders gets married and divorced and then remarried.

Peter Sagal runs The Boston Marathon as a guide for a visually impaired man.
